explains: adj. 极大的，巨大的；非常好，极好；无边无际的

sentences.en: If it had hit the Earth, it would have made a crater 100 miles across and thrown up an immense cloud of dust.
sentences.cn: 如果它撞上了地球，就会砸出一个100英里宽的大坑并扬起巨大的尘埃云团。

sentences.en: The town takes immense pride in recent achievements.
sentences.cn: 镇上的居民为最近的成就感到无比自豪。
